item.title: 6 stimulant alternatives that keep you away from coffee
item.description: People often drink coffee when they feel lethargic or when they are drowsy and want to get rid of it. However, there are six food substitutes for coffee that give the body a lot of energy and energy.

item.title: What are coffee diseases?
item.description: Coffee is a popular drink, and some people say they can’t imagine living without it, but drinking too much can lead to “caffeine poisoning”. Dr. Walid Sarhan, a Jordanian psychiatrist, says that coffee is a favorite international beverage, which is surpassed only in oil by international trade.
